title: What song has the lyrics 'dance dance dance'? - Quora

response.answer_text: “ I’m in the mood for dancing “ by The Nolans comes pretty close. I had the pleasure of kissing the lovely Coleen Nolan once when she was going out with Shane Richie (before they were married), I used to know Shane fairly well in those days and Coleen was and still is a great beauty . Also “ Dance Little Lady Dance “ by Tina Charles, has the line “ Dance, Dance, Dance “. Released in 1976 . Can’t think of any more, I was born in 1947 for goodness sake, what more do you want ? Hope this helps , Dave.
The title and the lyric are the same. Dance Dance Dance (Yowsah, Yowsah, Yowsah) by the group Chic. Very hot during the disco years.
